statements: SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure;
SELECT id, name, location FROM public_infrastructure;
SELECT name, type FROM public_infrastructure WHERE maintenance_status = 'Functional';
SELECT id, type FROM public_infrastructure WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, type, location, maintenance_status FROM public_infrastructure;
SELECT name, location, type FROM public_infrastructure WHERE maintenance_status = 'Under Maintenance';
SELECT id, type, name FROM public_infrastructure WHERE location = 'City Center' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM public_infrastructure WHERE type = 'Park' ORDER BY id LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, name FROM public_infrastructure WHERE maintenance_status = 'Functional' AND location LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM roads;
SELECT road_id, road_name FROM roads ORDER BY road_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM utilities WHERE utility_location='City Center';
SELECT utility_id, utility_type FROM utilities WHERE utility_type='Electricity';
SELECT road_name, road_condition FROM roads WHERE road_condition='Fair' ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT road_id, road_name, road_condition FROM roads WHERE road_condition = 'Good';
SELECT road_name, road_condition, road_id FROM roads WHERE road_condition = 'Fair';
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE road_condition = 'Poor';
SELECT road_id, road_name FROM roads WHERE road_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT road_id, road_name, road_condition FROM roads ORDER BY road_condition DESC;
SELECT * FROM roads ORDER BY road_name DESC
SELECT road_id, road_name FROM roads WHERE length_km > 50
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE road_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT road_id, road_name, length_km FROM roads ORDER BY length_km ASC
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM roads WHERE road_id = 3
SELECT road_id, road_name, length_km FROM roads ORDER BY length_km DESC;
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM roads WHERE length_km > 50 ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM roads WHERE road_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY road_id;
SELECT road_id, road_name, length_km FROM roads WHERE length_km BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY road_name DESC, road_id ASC;
SELECT road_name, length_km FROM roads WHERE length_km < 20 ORDER BY length_km DESC, road_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Roads;
SELECT road_name, road_length FROM Roads ORDER BY road_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bridges WHERE bridge_type = 'Suspension';
SELECT utility_name FROM Utilities WHERE utility_type = 'Water';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Roads;
SELECT road_id, road_name, road_length FROM Roads WHERE road_length > 10 ORDER BY road_id DESC;
SELECT bridge_name, bridge_capacity FROM Bridges WHERE bridge_capacity >= 100 ORDER BY bridge_name ASC;
SELECT utility_name, utility_type FROM Utilities WHERE utility_type = 'electricity';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Roads;
SELECT road_name, road_length, construction_date FROM Roads ORDER BY construction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Bridges WHERE engineer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT bridge_name, bridge_span, inspection_date FROM Bridges WHERE construction_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT utility_name, maintenance_frequency FROM Utilities WHERE utility_type = 'Electricity' AND maintenance_frequency > 5;
SELECT road_name, road_length, construction_date FROM Roads;
SELECT * FROM Bridges WHERE bridge_span > 100 ORDER BY bridge_name DESC;
SELECT utility_name, utility_type, installation_date FROM Utilities WHERE maintenance_frequency > 3 AND utility_type = 'Electricity' ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inspections WHERE inspector_department = 'Engineering' AND inspection_result = 'Pass' ORDER BY inspection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceRecords WHERE maintenance_cost > 5000 AND maintenance_type = 'Repairs' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
